entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning and early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Tuesday 21 March 2023
